mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.sm.repository.SM01012Repository.CODECOMSECC01 */ SELECT COMSEC_CODE, COMSEC_NAME, DEPT_YN, USER_CHG_YN, COLUMN_NAME FROM CODE_COMSEC ORDER BY comsec_code

/* com.neofect.gts.services.sm.repository.SM01012Repository.COMSECCODEC01 */ SELECT COMSEC_CODE, COMDIV_CODE, COMDIV_NAME, INPUT_YN, USE_YN, LMS_TAG, KIND1, NAME1, KIND2, NAME2, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, PRINT_SEQ, REMARK FROM CODE_COMDIV WHERE COMSEC_CODE = #{comsec} ORDER BY COMDIV_CODE
